text: Imme Dros (born 26 September 1936) is a Dutch children's writer. She was born in Oudeschild, Texel. She studied Dutch in Amsterdam. There she met her husband Harrie Geelen. She wrote her first book in 1971. Her husband has illustrated several of her books. Dros' works were mainly about fables or Odysseus during the Trojan War. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch children's writers Category:Writers from North Holland
title: Imme Dros
